name: deepwiki-generator
description: Generate comprehensive DeepWiki documentation using multi-stage AI pipeline with 23+ specialized agents

deepwiki.useMultiStagePipeline.description: Use the advanced multi-stage pipeline with 23+ specialized agents. Set to false to use the legacy 5-agent pipeline.

languageModelTools.name: deepwiki-generator_createDeepWiki
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Analyzes the current workspace and generates comprehensive DeepWiki documentation using a multi-stage pipeline with 23+ specialized AI agents. The pipeline performs file scanning, code parsing, dependency mapping, framework detection, pattern recognition, function/class analysis, API extraction, type analysis, example generation, cross-referencing, validation (accuracy, completeness, consistency), and professional documentation formatting.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Generate DeepWiki documentation for the current workspace by analyzing code structure, dependencies, and architecture.

outputPath.description: Optional output directory path for the generated DeepWiki. Defaults to '.deepwiki' in workspace root.

includePrivate.description: Whether to include private/internal APIs in documentation. Defaults to false.

maxDepth.description: Maximum depth for analyzing nested modules/packages. Defaults to 5.
